1112.content:
You shake your mane as you trot out to greet the day after the strangeness of whatever that explosion had been. You feel... different, somehow. Like your mind is clearer. You think about yourself.

You are a horse. You technically always knew this, of course, but this was the first time you ever considered this in detail. You're a horse, living on a farm, taken care of and used by humans. And your name is Snowflake, according to them.

There was no doubt about it, you were definitely more self aware and intelligent now. You weren't quite sure how, wondering if the explosion had something to do with it, only to have another strange thing catch your attention: you were hungry. But this wasn't normal. You had already eaten some hay and grass, but it didn't satisfy you. You had a craving for something else. Something... bigger. Meatier. This was a strange idea, as you had never done anything like that before, but still, the craving was there.

Trotting about, you notice the other animals in their own enclosures. You noticed a cow with a huge squirming belly, sheepdog with a bloated stomach almost the size of its body, and, most strangely, the sheep eagerly catching and swallowing some hens that had wandered too close to the fence. Something about this new pecking order on the farm seemed very wrong to you... and yet, also so very right. You knew that this was the answer to your craving. You needed to swallow something alive. But where to begin?
1112.title: Snowflake the Vore Horse

1522.title: Lucy

choices: She's let out the next morning
Grace wants to keep her inside
15221.content:
It was a breezy spring day, and Lucy had been out all morning riding the horses on her parents' farm. The one she was riding at the moment was particularly special: she was a centauress named Grace, sporting flowing golden hair and gorgeous black fur on her stallion body, along with a naturally large C bust. Lucy considered her to be her best friend, as she was rather shy around regular people.

As the two returned to the barn after a thrilling half-hour run, Lucy sat down beside Grace in her pen. "That was fun!" she exclaimed, reclining in the hay.

"It certainly was," Grace replied, straightening out her hair. She fixed her gaze on the girl, feeling her stomach rumble. "But, all that running's made me famished, and I could use a good snack!"

Lucy knew where this was heading. Grace loved the way people tasted, and would occasionally swallow down her as well, though she had to make Grace promise to let her out. She didn't mind it, though - this was another way the two deepened their friendship.

"Oh, alright, Grace," the brunette-haired girl said with a grin. "You can eat me. Just, don't forget - "

"Yeah, I know, 'Don't forget to let you out later.'" The centauress pulled Lucy's shirt off, along with her jean shorts, leaving her in just her white underwear. It was embarrassing at first, especially since Lucy had nowhere near the amount of cleavage that Grace boasted, but she was used to it now. Lucy held her arms out in front of her, and Grace happily started to gulp them down. Her head entered Grace's mouth, quickly followed by her shoulders and chest. Grace teased her small breasts with her tongue for a moment, knowing she hated that. Her waist easily slipped past Grace's lips, and finally her legs were slurped up like spaghetti.

Lucy, drenched in saliva, spilled out into Grace's stomach, feeling herself being pressed into a ball as there was little room for movement. She lay on her side, as it was slightly more comfortable, and smiled to herself, enjoying the warmth of her friend's insides.

"Comfy, Lucy?" Grace asked. "You were as delicious as always!"

"Glad to hear I'm still your favorite snack, Grace. And yeah, I'm quite comfortable in here."

Grace yawned, her human half resting in the same pile of hay Lucy had sat in. "Good. I'm going to take a nap. You should rest, too."

That seemed like a good idea to Lucy, and she closed her eyes, quickly falling asleep.
15221.title: Centauress' Snack

15223.content:
Lucy was changing.

I happened to everyone around her age, but for her it was different. While most girls discover boys at that time, Lucy had discovered something much more exotic: Vore.

It happened fairly quickly, one session on the internet and that was it, but the ability to eat things whole had taken a lot longer. it took months of eating mice and stray animals, now she could eat almost anything and work off the weight within a few days. And that was all the animals she got to eat for months, it became boring after a while.

But now as the perfect time to try loads of new meat since her parents had gone into the city for a week and left her in charge of the farm. It was a pretty big job for such a small girl, but they trusted her to not mess anything up.

“hehe, suckers” Lucy laughed to herself and got out of bed, her stomach rumbling at the feast that lay ahead.

Walking over to the wardrobe she thought about what she would wear today, Lucy had slept in the nude last night since her parents weren’t around and she loved the freedom it gave her. “I might stay like this” She thought, it was a hot day outside after all…

The girl kicked opens the front door and walked out into the fresh air, the sunlight glistening off her naked body as she looked around. “So much tasty meat” she said, her mouth-watering “What will I eat first?”
152232.title: She stays like that

1522321.content:
“James!” she called out, smiling with pleasure at the thought of devouring the Border collie. he was a new dog; the family had only gotten him about a year ago, but he’d grown nice and fat during that time. “James, come here boy” Lucy shouted again before seeing the dog running towards her, a dumb smile on his face.

Lucy bent down to rub the dog, gasping lightly as his wet nose rubbed against her bare skin, she always loved it when he did that. “Do I smell nice boy?” Lucy asked as the dog walked around and sniffed her naked buttocks, apparently she did.

Twirling around, she quickly scooped the dog up and held him close to her chest. As his tail wagged with pleasure Lucy’s moved her head around and licked his face, she’d never tasted a collie before but James had a lovely doggy taste and smell to him. He would be a perfect start to a long day of feasting.
“Since you love smelling me so much, you’re going to love this” The girl said before opening her mouth and shoving his nose inside, giving the dog a good whiff of her hot breath. James looked up at her in shock before Lucy jerked her jaws forward again and took his entire head into her gaping maw.

“mmmm” The girl moaned as her tongue lapped up his delicious flavour, the border collie tasted a bit like beef but with a slightly spicy kick to him, and Lucy loved spice. She moved her jaws forward again, taking him in up to his neck as he struggled to escape, but Lucy had done this before and was used to her meals putting up a fight.

Inside, James mind was in a state of panic as he scanned his surroundings. He’d never considered humans a threat but here he was being eaten by one, maybe he’d done something bad and this was just punishment. The Collie’s nose twitched desperately, filling with the smell of the girl’s breath and previous meals as he was pulled down further towards his demise.

Outside, Drool leaked from the sides of Lucy’s mouth as she gulped him down, eventually arriving at his meaty haunches. The girl stopped for a moment to listen to his futile whimpering, as if it was going to change her mind at this point. Finally deciding that she’d put the dog through enough torture, Lucy put her head up to the heavens and gulped down the last of her delicious meal, sucking in his tail like a strand of meaty spaghetti.

Collapsing on the ground, Lucy rubbed her huge stomach and felt the dog struggling within. His little paws hitting against the strong belly walls as it filled with acid, Lucy knew that James only had a few minutes before her strong stomach would overcome him and begin absorbing his body.

After that it was only a matter of who she would go after next, Lucy decided it would be…
